name: ROLL THE DICE AND KILL THE ZOMBIE
name_original: ROLL THE DICE AND KILL THE ZOMBIE
description:
ROLE THE DICE AND KILL THE ZOMBIE

FOR EXAMPLE WHEN YOUR DICE NUMBER IS 1 THEN 1ST NUMBER ZOMBIE WILL DIED.

WHEN YOUR DICE NUMBER IS 2 THEN  2ND NUMBER ZOMBIE WILL DIED.

AND SURVIVE 100 SECONDS TO WIN.AND BE CAREFUL 

WHEN THE ZOMBIE REACHED TO THE DICE THEN YOUR GAME IS OVER.
